name: True Story Time
description:
Welcome to "True Story Time" - the ultimate party game that guarantees endless laughter and unforgettable moments with friends!

Dive into a world of hilarity and creativity with this cooperative room-based storytelling adventure. In "True Story Time," every player is a storyteller, crafting outrageous narratives one word at a time. But here's the twist - after each contribution, it's up to the group to vote for the continuation they believe will take the story to new heights of hilarity!

With "True Story Time," the fun never stops. Whether you're concocting wild adventures, spinning absurd yarns, or crafting side-splitting punchlines, every moment is a chance to showcase your wit and humor. And with the power of teamwork, you'll collaboratively create a masterpiece of comedic storytelling that will leave everyone in stitches.

So gather your friends, unleash your imagination, and get ready for a gaming experience like no other. "True Story Time" isn't just a game - it's a journey into the heart of laughter, where every story is as unique as the friends who tell it. Don't miss out on the laughter and camaraderie. Get your copy of "True Story Time" now and let the storytelling begin!
